member.name: T:Universal.Common.BitSequence
member.summary: A class that represents a sequence of bits in the given order.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the with the specified number of bits set to off.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the values contained in a given enumerable instance.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the values given in the binary representation as a string.

member.name: P:Universal.Common.BitSequence.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the bit at the given index.

member.name: P:Universal.Common.BitSequence.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of bits given in the current sequence.

member.name: P:Universal.Common.BitSequence.Length
member.summary: Returns the number of bits given in the current sequence.

member.name: P:Universal.Common.BitSequence.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Returns true if the current is read-only.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.Add(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a given bit to sequence.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given bits represented as a binary string to the .

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.Add(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Adds the bits in the given collection to the end of the .

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.Clear
member.summary: Clears all bits in the sequence.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the bit at the given index.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.GetOctet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the i-th octet of this .

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.ToBitArray
member.summary: Returns a new instance of the class from this sequence.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.ToByte
member.summary: Returns a byte representation of the current sequence of bits. A sequence of "00000001" will be converted to 0b_00000001 and so on.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.ToByteArray
member.summary: Returns a byte array representation of the current sequence of bits, based on piecewise conversion of each 8-bit group into bytes.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.ToString
member.summary: Returns a binary string representation of the current sequence of bits.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.ToUInt16
member.summary: Returns an unsigned short that has the binary representation of the given bits. Short sequences are padded on the left (of the binary representation) with off bits and long sequences are truncated from the left until the required length is achieved.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.ToUInt32
member.summary: Returns an unsigned int that has the binary representation of the given bits. Short sequences are padded on the left (of the binary representation) with off bits and long sequences are truncated from the left until the required length is achieved.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.ToUInt64
member.summary: Returns an unsigned long that has the binary representation of the given bits. Short sequences are padded on the left (of the binary representation) with off bits and long sequences are truncated from the left until the required length is achieved.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_Implicit(System.String)~Universal.Common.BitSequence
member.summary: Converts the given binary representation to a object.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_BitwiseAnd(Universal.Common.BitSequence,Universal.Common.BitSequence)
member.summary: Returns a new which has bits set if and only if the corresponding bits in the two sequences are set.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_BitwiseOr(Universal.Common.BitSequence,Universal.Common.BitSequence)
member.summary: Returns a new which has bits set if any of the bits in the corresponding position in the two sequences are set.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_ExclusiveOr(Universal.Common.BitSequence,Universal.Common.BitSequence)
member.summary: Returns a new which has bits set if either, but not both of the sequences have their bits set.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_LeftShift(Universal.Common.BitSequence,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new with the bits left-shifted by the given number of positions. Right-side bits outside the index are set to off.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_RightShift(Universal.Common.BitSequence,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new with the bits right-shifted by the given number of positions. Left-side bits outside the index are set to off.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_OnesComplement(Universal.Common.BitSequence)
member.summary: Flips the bits in the given sequence.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_Equality(Universal.Common.BitSequence,Universal.Common.BitSequence)
member.summary: Returns if two instances are sequence equals.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.BitSequence.op_Inequality(Universal.Common.BitSequence,Universal.Common.BitSequence)
member.summary: Returns the negation of lhs == rhs.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.Extensions.StreamExtensions.ReadExact(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream until the number of bytes are read and advances the position in the stream by the specified amount. Returns true if the requested number of bytes are successfully read or false if no bytes were read. Throws an exception if a partial number of bytes were read.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.Extensions.StreamExtensions.ReadExactAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream until the number of bytes are read and advances the position in the stream by the specified amount.
